title: Hextech boxes and Key fragments
body:
So the rather annoying key fragments.
For the past 3-4 weeks i have probably received 2 key fragments out of the many games that i have won.
Needless to say though, I've been stacking up Hextech boxes like a back room worker at a supermarket.
Now I am almost certain that key fragments are not meant to be that scarce, but its relatively irritating when you have 4 Hextech boxes and only 2 key fragments.

replies.body:
> The drop rate for key fragments is a curve, not a line. With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment.
>
We wanted to give players who didn't play as frequently a good drop rate for keys, without making it feel like farming was mandatory if you wanted keys.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide

but its also supposed to increase in chance after every consecutive win without earning a key
Im not sure if this is the way its supposed to be or not, but i don't earn any fragments for a week or two, and then suddenly earn 3 or 4 in a row. its really weird.

I agree. The drop rate for key shards is totally bs, in fact I just recently made a post on this exact subject.

I am now counting, and I have played 25 games without getting a shard. 11 of those have been wins. More than half of those wins were in a pre made, thus INCREASING my chances, and yet even then I still don't get a key.

At the end of the day it comes down to the fact that Riot is trying to trick us into thinking they are giving us fee stuff when it's really just another way for them to earn money.
